io.vertx.json.schema.common

Interface SchemaParserInternal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SchemaParser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSchemaParser, Draft201909SchemaParser, Draft7SchemaParser, OpenAPI3SchemaParser

    public interface SchemaParserInternal
extends SchemaParser
